title: Cooperative catalytic behavior of CoS and Bi2S3 nanoparticles on Zr:BiVO4 photoanodes for enhanced photoelectrochemical sulfite oxidation coupled with pharmaceutical pollution degradation
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, 11,2668-2682
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00018H, Paper
Prabhakarn Arunachalam, Maged N. Shaddad, Mabrook S. Amer, Abdulaziz M. Alsalman, Jagannathan Madhavan
The construction of Zr:BiVO4@Bi2S3â€“CoS heterojunctions has been demonstrated to be an effective way to facilitate PEC water splitting and degradation of organic pollutants.
